message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds of inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is a more fair reflection of the current value of the money.  Let's end this quickly and avoid further inflation.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This deal benefits us both as the money is quickly losing value.
